Extensions.​bit

Extension functions for the bit library.

Functions
Pack
function bit.Pack(
bitCount,
...
)

Compresses a set of unsigned integers into the space of a single number.

Note

For most use cases it is recommended to use encoders instead.

Parameters
number bitCount

The amount of bits to allocate per number.

number ...

Any amount of unsigned integers to fit into the resulting integer, trying to fit more than 32 bits into a single number will result in an error being thrown.

Returns
number

The packed integer.

See Also

Unpack

Unpack
function bit.Unpack(
bitCount,
num
)

Decompresses a packed unsigned integer back into it's constituent numbers.

Parameters
number bitCount

The amount of bits allocated per number.

number num

The packed integer.

Returns
number ...

The unpacked integers, the amount of args returned is equal to the floored value of 32 / bitCount.

See Also

Pack
